Stat.HealEffectivenessRate: 得到的恢復效果強化率

StatTooltip.MaxHP: The character's Maximum HP. When HP reaches 0 they will be defeated and retreat from battle.
StatTooltip.AttackPower: Affects the amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.DefensePower: Affects the amount of damage received from incoming attacks.
StatTooltip.HealPower: Affects the amount of HP restored by healing abilities and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
StatTooltip.AccuracyPoint: Affects the chance for attacks to hit their target. Chance to hit is guaranteed when greater than the target's Evasion.
StatTooltip.DodgePoint: Affects the chance to evade incoming attacks. Evading only becomes possible when greater than the attacker's Accuracy.
StatTooltip.CriticalPoint: Affects the chance of dealing critical hits. Critical hits normally only become possible when greater than the target's Crit RES.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageRate: Affects the multiplier applied to damage dealt when the attack critically hits. Reduced by target's Crit DMG RES.
StatTooltip.HealEffectivenessRate: Affects the amount of HP restored by incoming healing abilities. Has no effect on barrier abilities.
StatTooltip.OppressionPower: Affects the chance of inflicting a Crowd Control effect. Also increases the amount of CC gauge filled when using CC abilities on certain enemies.
StatTooltip.OppressionResist: Affects the chance of being inflicted with a Crowd Control effect.
StatTooltip.CriticalChanceResistPoint: Affects the chance of receiving critical hits. Critical hits only become possible when lower than the attacker's Crit.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageResistRate: Affects the multiplier applied to damage received when an incoming attack critically hits.
StatTooltip.StabilityPoint: Affects the minimum amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities. A higher stability value will result in average damage dealt closer to 100%.
StatTooltip.StabilityRate: Affects the minimum amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.Range: The maximum range of the character's normal attacks.
StatTooltip.AmmoCount: The maximum amount of weapon ammunition. Weapon ammunition is used by the character's normal attacks, and they must reload when this reaches 0.
StatTooltip.MoveSpeed: Affects the speed at which the character can move.
StatTooltip.DamageRatio: Affects the final multiplier applied to damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.DamagedRatio: Affects the final multiplier applied to damage received from incoming attacks.
StatTooltip.AttackSpeed: Affects the speed of normal attacks, reloads and attack delay.
StatTooltip.BlockRate: Affects the base chance to block incoming attacks when taking cover.
StatTooltip.DefensePenetration: Affects the amount of target DEF that is ignored when dealing damage.
StatTooltip.RegenCost: Affects the rate at which the character generates skill cost.
StatTooltip.SightPoint: Affects the maximum range of the character's EX and Basic skills.
StatTooltip.EnhanceExplosionRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Explosive damage against a Light Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhancePierceRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Piercing damage against a Heavy Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceMysticRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Mystic damage against a Special Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceSonicRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Sonic damage against a Elastic Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceLightArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Light Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Heavy Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceUnarmedRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Special Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceElasticArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Elastic Armor.
StatTooltip.ExtendBuffDuration: Affects the duration of buffs granted to self and allies.
StatTooltip.ExtendDebuffDuration: Affects the duration of debuffs inflicted on enemies.
StatTooltip.ExtendCrowdControlDuration: Affects the duration of CC effects inflicted on enemies.

BuffTooltip.Buff_AttackSpeed: Increases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and reduces attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Buff_BlockRate: Increases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostChange: Reduces the amount of skill cost required for using the EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostRegen: Increases the rate at which skill cost is recovered.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChance: Increases the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.

BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamage: Increases the damage dealt by critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamageRateResist: Decreases the damage received from critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedLimit: Limits the amount of damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedRatio: Decreases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.

BuffTooltip.Buff_Dodge: Increases the chance of successfully evading attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DotHeal: Continuously restores HP at set intervals.

BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceMysticRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.

BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceLightArmorRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Light Armor.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Heavy Armor.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Special Armor.

BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendDebuffDuration: Increases the duration of debuffs inflicted on enemies.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendCrowdControlDuration: Increases the duration of Crowd Control effects inflicted on enemies.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealByHit_Damaged: Restores HP each time damage is taken from an attack.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealEffectiveness: Increases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealPower: Increases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.

BuffTooltip.Buff_Stability: Increases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.

BuffTooltip.Debuff_ATK: Decreases the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AttackSpeed: Decreases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and increases attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_BlockRate: Decreases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Burn: Continuously receives Burn damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Cheerleading: Continuously receives damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Chill: Continuously receives Chill damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.

BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageByHit_Damaged: Receives additional damage when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamagedRatio: Increases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.

BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceMysticRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceSonicRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Sonic type attacks against Elastic Armor targets.

BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Increases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Heavy Armor.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: Increases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Special Armor.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealedLimit: Limits the amount of HP healing abilities will restore.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealEffectiveness: Decreases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealPower: Decreases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Hieronymus: Inflicts continuous damage over time. Inflicts a large amount of damage in a circular area around the target if this debuff is not removed before it expires. This debuff can only be removed by healing the afflicted to 100% HP.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HIT: Increases the chance of missing when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionPower: Decreases the chance of successfully inflicting Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionResist: Increases the chance of being inflicting with Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Penetration: Decreases the amount of enemy defense that will be ignored by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Poison: Continuously receives poison damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Range: Decreases the distance from which Normal Attacks can be performed.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ElectricShock: Continuously receives Electric Shock damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Stability: Decreases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.
BuffTooltip.CC_Fear: Unable to act and will slowly move away from whoever inflicted fear on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Stunned: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Provoke: Forced to attack whoever inflicted taunt on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Paralysis: 無法行動並打斷任何主動技能。
BuffTooltip.CC_Emp: 無法行動並打斷任何主動技能。
BuffTooltip.CC_Confusion: Attacks allies instead of enemies. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryEmpty:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5× (half) or 2× (full).
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryHalf:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5×.
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryFull:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 2×.
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_Immortal: Able to withstand most attacks without being defeated for the duration of the effect.
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneDamage: Immune to some or all types of incoming damage.
BuffTooltip.Special_Fury: Increases the damage dealt by Neru's EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_Misdeed: Decreases DEF with each stack held and generates skill cost when Aru (New Year) uses her EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_LittleDevil: Increases Crit DMG with each stack held and increases the damage dealt by Mutuski (New Year)'s Basic Skill when at 6 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Accumulation: All damage dealt to this target for the duration of the effect will be accumulated and dealt again as an additional hit once this expires.
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneCC: Immune to all Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Special_SuddenDeath: A stack of 5 will deal lethal damage to the character.
BuffTooltip.Special_Stamp: Reduces allies' EX skill cost and restores own HP when Kokona reaches 5 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Holiday: 提升此角色的特定EX技能的效果。
BuffTooltip.Special_SilverBullet: Augments Sakurako's normal attack to deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0187Mod: Increases Toki's ATK, Accuracy and Evasion and changes her EX Skill, Basic Skill and Normal Attack pattern. Ends after using the EX Skill 3 times.
BuffTooltip.Special_Omamori: Increases Mystic Effectiveness upon activation of Kayoko (New Year)'s Sub Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_Dado: Kaho's attacks will deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_OldBook: Activates Ui (Swimsuit)'s Basic Skill when at 3 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0089_ExtraPassive: Deals additional damage to the target(s) of Kasumi's EX Skill when at 3 stacks.

ui.home_introduction: Schale 是 Nexon Games 開發，日服由 Yostar、國際服由 Nexon 運營的手游蔚藍檔案的非官方數據庫。
ui.home_change_server: 請使用設置選單 選擇日服/國際服以顯示對應伺服器的内容。
ui.home_features_list:
• 有關全體學生和技能，包含召喚單位與載具單位的完整資訊。
  • 全面的數據計算，可以顯示學生在任何星級、等級、裝備和技能的增益效果下的面板數據。
  • 完整的物品、裝備和傢俱數據庫。
  • 所有關卡的獎勵掉落、地圖和詳細的敵人資訊。
  • 總力戰BOSS與綜合戰術考試的數據與技能資訊。
  • 查看從合成節點可能獲取物品的機率。
ui.home_footer_text:
Schale 由 lonqie 開發與維護，Blue-Roar、factistel、TKRotund、yumiruuwu 与 akintos 提供額外翻譯。
Schale 與 Yostar、Nexon、Nexon Games 沒有關聯。本數據庫中使用的所有遊戲作品、資訊和素材均爲各自作者的財產和版權。
